sentences.sContent: Students on the course learn about all aspects of business.
sentences.sCn: 这门课程的学生要学习商业活动的各个方面。

sentences.sContent: Carl began in the music business by running a recording studio.
sentences.sCn: 卡尔是从经营录音棚开始干音乐这一行的。

sentences.sContent: We do business with a number of Italian companies.
sentences.sCn: 我们和一些意大利公司做生意。

sentences.sContent: ...recording Ben as he goes about his business.
...After graduating with a degree in business and accounting...
...Facing the choices of working in a state-owned business and a joint venture...
...the program for and about business people...
...When I went down to the bank and got a business loan...
...So like any other business you have to make choices...
...I want to start my own business because I love do what I love...
...Maria McCartney has been in the mobile ice-cream business since 2005...
...but if business is slower than usual...
...it is an undeniable fact the state-owned business can provide a stable life for me...

synos.tran: 商业；生意；[贸易]交易；事情

phrases.pCn: 商业模式；经营模式；业务模式
好生意；有意义的业务往来
经营策略；商业策略；企业发展战略

trans.tranOther: the activity of making money by producing or buying and selling goods, or providing services
